pr_title: Remove t3 channel in IT tests and add it to separate IT class.

timeline.message: Modifying the tests to use default channel for wlst deployment

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to add t3channel to the existing MII domain used in the dedicated mode tests and use that to deploy the application using WLST instead of adding new domain? It saves time by not bringing up a new domain.
timeline.author: vanajamukkara

replies.bodyText:
I don't want to modify the common model file used for this image MII_BASIC_IMAGE_NAME + ":" + MII_BASIC_IMAGE_TAG because it is shared by many tests.
Since anyway this test is running alone, the time it take to run this test shouldn't matter IMO.
